explains: n. 纠缠；铁丝网；缠绕物；牵连

sentences.en: Many dolphins die each year from entanglement in fishing nets.
sentences.cn: 每年都有许多海豚被捕鱼网缠绕致死。

sentences.en: Many dolphins are accidentally killed through entanglement with fishing equipment.
sentences.cn: 很多海豚因捕鱼设备的缠绕而意外死亡。

sentences.en: While physicists have demonstrated entanglement with specially prepared atoms, no-one knows if it also exists between atoms making up human minds.
sentences.cn: 尽管物理学家已经证明了特制原子之间存在纠缠，但没人知道它是否也存在于组成人类思维的原子之间。
